rules_text:
Lifelink
When Decadent Dragon enters create a Food token. [i](It’s an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
{U}{B}, Sacrifice a Food: Create a tapped Treasure token. You gain 3 life. [i](It’s an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
